ccre.ctrl

Interface ISimpleJoystick

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDispatchJoystick

    public interface ISimpleJoystick
    A joystick that provides pollable channels for all of its inputs.
    See Also:
    IDispatchJoystick

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FloatInputPoll getAxisChannel(int axis)
      Get a FloatInputPoll representing the state of the specified axis on this joystick.
      BooleanInputPoll getButtonChannel(int button)
      Get a BooleanInputPoll representing whether or not the given button is pressed.
      FloatInputPoll getXChannel()
      Get a FloatInputPoll for the X axis.
      FloatInputPoll getYChannel()
      Get a FloatInputPoll for the Y axis.

    • Method Detail

      • getAxisChannel

        FloatInputPoll getAxisChannel(int axis)
        Get a FloatInputPoll representing the state of the specified axis on this joystick.
        Parameters:
        axis - the axis ID.
        Returns:
        the FloatInputPoll representing the status of the axis.

      • getXChannel

        FloatInputPoll getXChannel()
        Get a FloatInputPoll for the X axis.
        Returns:
        the FloatInputPoll representing the status of the X axis.

      • getYChannel

        FloatInputPoll getYChannel()
        Get a FloatInputPoll for the Y axis.
        Returns:
        the FloatInputPoll representing the status of the Y axis.

      • getButtonChannel

        BooleanInputPoll getButtonChannel(int button)
        Get a BooleanInputPoll representing whether or not the given button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        button - the button ID.
        Returns:
        the BooleanInputPoll representing if the given button is pressed.
